item.title: Git - cheet sheet
item.description: How to do something in git, helpers

item.title: Vocaboard
item.description: The goals of this project are to investigate the field of foreign language learning, to find problems in learning new languages and, as a result, to create tools and solutions that will help potential users.

item.title: ADR or Architecture Decision Records
item.description: Architecture Decision Records (ADR) is a technique of documenting decisions in the development process in a comprehensible and continuous way.
